blogs.title: Papers on tropospheric temperatures
blogs.summary:
This is a list of papers on the temperature of the troposphere. The list is not complete, and will most likely be updated in the future in order to make it more thorough and more representative.
UPDATE (February 8, 2011): Thorne et al. (2010) added, thanks

news.title: Climate change measuring instruments are on life support | John Abraham
news.summary: Programs to measure climate changes may be heading for declines due to budget cuts Scientists have adopted basic rules of management, such as: " You can't manage what you can't measure. " This is a truism in climate science. In order to understand where ou

wikipedia.title: James Hansen
wikipedia.summary: James Edward Hansen (born March 29, 1941) is an American adjunct professor in the Department of Earth and Environmental Sciences at Columbia University.

wikipedia.title: UAH satellite temperature dataset
wikipedia.summary: The UAH satellite temperature dataset, developed at the University of Alabama in Huntsville, attempts to infer the temperature of the atmosphere at various levels from satellite measurements of radiance.
